snippet: Mondelez International said that price increases scared off some customers in its second quarter and the company trimmed its sales forecast for the year.
abstract: Mondelez International says price increases scared off some customers in its second quarter and trims its sales forecast for the year; earned $622 million in quarter ended June 30, or 36 cents a share.
lead_paragraph: Mondelez International said that price increases scared off some customers in its second quarter and the company trimmed its sales forecast for the year.

headline.main: Manufacturer of Oreo Cookies Lowers Its 2014 Sales Forecast
headline.print_headline: Manufacturer of Oreo Cookies Lowers Its 2014 Sales Forecast
